Docs.summary: Class that contains static methods for item prediction

MemberSignature.Value: public static int[] PredictItems (MyMediaLite.RecommenderEngine engine, int user_id, System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<int> relevant_items);

Docs.param: the recommender engine to use
the numerical ID of the user
a collection of numerical IDs of relevant items
Docs.summary: Predict items for a given user
Docs.returns: an ordered list of items, the most likely item first

the user ID
the maximum item ID
Docs.summary: predict items for a specific users
Docs.returns: a list sorted list of item IDs

Docs.summary: Write item predictions (scores) for all users to a TextWriter object
